DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate early bronchodilating effect SKP FlutiForm HFA pMDI compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Single-dose Crossover Study Evaluate Early Bronchodilating Effect FlutiForm HFA pMDI Adult Subjects With Mild Moderate Asthma
DOC.criteria: Subjects document history mild moderate asthma currently take stable dose inhale corticosteroid Participation prior FlutiForm study Smoking history within last 12 month , Significant , nonreversible , pulmonary disease Lifethreatening asthma within last year
